creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: tree at L; woman at center with back to viewer, reaching toward a lower branch with the PR hand; seated figure at R
marks:
Signature, Stamp

-- in graphite on verso: S. Iv signed in plate, lower right: [COROT]
provenance: Carl Sachs, Breslau, sale in 1931; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Young Girl and Death, From Quarante Cliché-Glaces
